title: What is a computer? (NP)
creator_credit: Video Arts, International Computers and Robert Reid
brief_description: This film gives an introduction to the computer. Explains the relationship between the central processing unit and the computer’s peripherals - the video console, the printer, the card reader, the magnetic tape unit and the disc unit. Narrated by John Cleese. Also suitable for lower and middle secondary levels.
